rules.natural: Either a customer complaint occurs about the table, or if it is not the case that approved material implies that being made from metal results in the table not being defective, then the table is scrapped.
There is a warranty claim for the table or there is no customer complaint about the table.
Whenever a product recall is issued for the table, there is no warranty claim for the table.
Provided that the table is repaired, it is scrapped.

If the customer is a premium customer, then either the table receives a quality award, or if it is not the case that approved material implies that being made from metal results in the table not being defective, then the table is repaired.
The assembly line runs for the table, or if it is not the case that the table passes inspection or is not defective, then redesign is needed for the table.
Materials being used for the table implies that workers are busy with the table.
On the condition that it is the day shift for the table, if the assembly line is running for the table, then materials are used for the table.
The table is produced during the day shift or the night shift.
In the event that it is the night shift for the table, then if the assembly line is running for the table, materials are used for the table.
When the table is made from wood, it passes inspection.
The table is made from wood or the table is made from metal.
If the table is scrapped, then it is not shipped.
In cases where the supervisor approves the table, then if it is not the case that approved material implies that being made from metal results in the table not being defective, the table is scrapped.
Either the supervisor approves the table or the manager approves the table.

On the condition that the manager approves the table, if it is not the case that approved material implies that being made from metal results in the table not being defective, then the table is scrapped.
In the event that it is not the case that approved material implies that being made from metal results in the table not being defective, the table is shipped.
When the table is not perfect, it is defective.
